extends Remote
    An enterprise service.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    Kelly

      String getServerInterfaceName()

    • Method Detail

      • getServerInterfaceName

        String getServerInterfaceName()
                       throws RemoteException
        Get the interface name of the service. Nominally, this should return the fully qualified class name of the implementation class, not the interface name. No idea how that "standard" got started. So, a good return value might be jpl.oodt.product.rmi.ProductServiceImpl and not jpl.oodt.product.ProductService.
        Returns:
        a String value.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - if an error occurs.

        Returns:
        Response.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - if an error occurs.

           throws RemoteException
        Control the server asynchronously.
